item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi there, I’m just a curious kid who loves solving real world problems using code. My brief history in programming(Cringe Warning, Skip Ahead) I developed an interest towards programming when we where taught QBasic in 6th grade. That interest grew when I was introduced to HTML in 8th grade, we were taught how to create a form but not how to handle it, so I looked for answers on my own and found PHP ðŸ˜¶.
